Mintipers Chapbook was a series of articles on the Wizards of the Coast website, published between 2001 and 2002, written by Eric L. Boyd, writing as a chronicler of the "famous" in-universe bard, Mintiper Moonsilver. Each article presented an excerpt or summary of the song, poem, or story, followed by analysis by the Keeper of the Vault of the Sages in Silverymoon.
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011219204845/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829a Part 1 Moonlights Triumph]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011007013148/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829b Part 2 Tree of Wailing Souls]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011007014153/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829c Part 3 Leaves of Gold]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20020202073415/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829d Part 4 Crypt of the Black Hand]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011007020755/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829e Part 5 Myth Glaurach]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011203111501/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829f Part 6 Trail of Mists]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011007022658/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829g Part 7 Gildenfire]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011006174656/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20010829h Part 8 Grandfather Tree]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20011122202337/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20011031a Part 9 Hall of Mists]
# [https//web.archive.org/web/20020407154652/http//www.wizards.com/dnd/article.asp?x=dnd/mc/mc20020130a Part 10 Chroniclers Compendium]
